summary: The diff shows that REQ-58 has been fully implemented. The Google Ads tracking tag (gtag.js) with ID AW-17968689708 was successfully added to frontend/index.html in the <head> section, before the closing </head> tag, with all required components: async script loader, dataLayer initialization, and gtag config. The existing Google Search Console meta tag was preserved. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
